      <span class="d-inline-block ml-1 v-align-middle">↵</span>
    </div>
  </a>
</li>


    <li class="d-flex flex-justify-center flex-items-center p-0 f5 js-jump-to-suggestion">
      <img src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/spinners/octocat-spinner-128.gif" alt="Octocat Spinner Icon" class="m-2" width="28">
    </li>
</ul>

            </div>
      </label>
</form>  </div>
</div>


      <nav class="d-flex" aria-label="Global">


  <a class="js-selected-navigation-item Header-link  mr-3" data-hotkey="g p" data-ga-click="Header, click, Nav menu - item:pulls context:user" aria-label="Pull requests you created" data-selected-links="/pulls /pulls/assigned /pulls/mentioned /pulls" href="/pulls">

  <include-fragment class="js-notification-shelf-include-fragment" data-base-src="https://github.com/notifications/beta/shelf"></include-fragment>




  <div class="application-main " data-commit-hovercards-enabled>
        <div itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/SoftwareSourceCode" class="">
    <main id="js-repo-pjax-container" data-pjax-container >
      

  




  









  <div class="pagehead repohead hx_repohead readability-menu bg-gray-light pb-0 pt-3">

    <div class="d-flex container-lg mb-4 px-3">

      <div class="flex-auto min-width-0 width-fit mr-3">
        <h1 class="public  d-flex flex-wrap flex-items-center break-word float-none ">

      <div class="d-inline"><svg class="octicon octicon-gear" viewBox="0 0 14 16" version="1.1" width="14" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M14 8.77v-1.6l-1.94-.64-.45-1.09.88-1.84-1.13-1.13-1.81.91-1.09-.45-.69-1.92h-1.6l-.63 1.94-1.11.45-1.84-.88-1.13 1.13.91 1.81-.45 1.09L0 7.23v1.59l1.94.64.45 1.09-.88 1.84 1.13 1.13 1.81-.91 1.09.45.69 1.92h1.59l.63-1.94 1.11-.45 1.84.88 1.13-1.13-.92-1.81.47-1.09L14 8.75v.02zM7 11c-1.66 0-3-1.34-3-3s1.34-3 3-3 3 1.34 3 3-1.34 3-3 3z"/></svg></div>
      Settings
</a>
</nav>


  </div>

    <span class="dropdown-caret"></span>

    <div class="get-repo-modal dropdown-menu dropdown-menu-sw pb-0 js-toggler-container  js-get-repo-modal">

      <div class="get-repo-modal-options">
          <div class="clone-options https-clone-options">
              <!-- '"` --><!-- </textarea></xmp> --></option></form><form data-remote="true" action="/users/set_protocol?protocol_selector=ssh&amp;protocol_type=push" accept-charset="UTF-8" method="post"><input type="hidden" name="authenticity_token" value="UduwYIc+Q/p+yXv9mB41Ca4dLe83wMKYKXRAphgnk47KUdKPz+3pkN4ckpozv6PDcl/qND8RhbABfEUJKqIyuA==" /><button name="button" type="submit" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;clone_or_download.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;feature_clicked&quot;:&quot;USE_SSH&quot;,&quot;git_repository_type&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY&quot;,&quot;repository_id&quot;:92784148,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:8007722}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="706defdb89e8c3748df72d9aaf5e95fad99e5be6299e4987c2e9fa244523dee9" class="btn-link btn-change-protocol js-toggler-target float-right">Use SSH</button></form>

            <h4 class="mb-1">
              Clone with HTTPS
              <a class="muted-link" href="https://help.github.com/articles/which-remote-url-should-i-use" target="_blank" title="Which remote URL should I use?">
                <svg class="octicon octicon-question" viewBox="0 0 14 16" version="1.1" width="14" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6 10h2v2H6v-2zm4-3.5C10 8.64 8 9 8 9H6c0-.55.45-1 1-1h.5c.28 0 .5-.22.5-.5v-1c0-.28-.22-.5-.5-.5h-1c-.28 0-.5.22-.5.5V7H4c0-1.5 1.5-3 3-3s3 1 3 2.5zM7 2.3c3.14 0 5.7 2.56 5.7 5.7s-2.56 5.7-5.7 5.7A5.71 5.71 0 011.3 8c0-3.14 2.56-5.7 5.7-5.7zM7 1C3.14 1 0 4.14 0 8s3.14 7 7 7 7-3.14 7-7-3.14-7-7-7z"/></svg>
              </a>
            </h4>
            <p class="mb-2 get-repo-decription-text">
              Use Git or checkout with SVN using the web URL.
            </p>

            <div class="input-group">
  <input type="text" class="form-control input-monospace input-sm" data-autoselect value="https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli.git" aria-label="Clone this repository at https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli.git" readonly>
  <div class="input-group-button">
    <clipboard-copy value="https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli.git" aria-label="Copy to clipboard" class="btn btn-sm" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;clone_or_download.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;feature_clicked&quot;:&quot;COPY_URL&quot;,&quot;git_repository_type&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY&quot;,&quot;repository_id&quot;:92784148,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:8007722}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="225dac5bb9a585254cb08d70d0c5b63f56c307233d941462436c1c088271d773"><svg class="octicon octicon-clippy" viewBox="0 0 14 16" version="1.1" width="14" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M2 13h4v1H2v-1zm5-6H2v1h5V7zm2 3V8l-3 3 3 3v-2h5v-2H9zM4.5 9H2v1h2.5V9zM2 12h2.5v-1H2v1zm9 1h1v2c-.02.28-.11.52-.3.7-.19.18-.42.28-.7.3H1c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1V4c0-.55.45-1 1-1h3c0-1.11.89-2 2-2 1.11 0 2 .89 2 2h3c.55 0 1 .45 1 1v5h-1V6H1v9h10v-2zM2 5h8c0-.55-.45-1-1-1H8c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s-.45-1-1-1-1 .45-1 1-.45 1-1 1H3c-.55 0-1 .45-1 1z"/></svg></clipboard-copy>
  </div>
</div>

          </div>

          <div class="clone-options ssh-clone-options">
              <!-- '"` --><!-- </textarea></xmp> --></option></form><form data-remote="true" action="/users/set_protocol?protocol_selector=https&amp;protocol_type=push" accept-charset="UTF-8" method="post"><input type="hidden" name="authenticity_token" value="f+cxsK9wuPkx94ZaMfSEfzgyDxVM9RLZ5ZlBggHbhSHkbVNf56MSk5Eibz2aVRK15HDIzkQkVfHNkUQtM14kFw==" /><button name="button" type="submit" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;clone_or_download.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;feature_clicked&quot;:&quot;USE_HTTPS&quot;,&quot;git_repository_type&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY&quot;,&quot;repository_id&quot;:92784148,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:8007722}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="9022a94abba40121d965b0f64dbc3eee04cc997f1456772e4888bb4062259709" class="btn-link btn-change-protocol js-toggler-target float-right">Use HTTPS</button></form>
              <h4 class="mb-1">
                Clone with SSH
                <a class="muted-link" href="https://help.github.com/articles/which-remote-url-should-i-use" target="_blank" title="Which remote URL should I use?">
                  <svg class="octicon octicon-question" viewBox="0 0 14 16" version="1.1" width="14" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6 10h2v2H6v-2zm4-3.5C10 8.64 8 9 8 9H6c0-.55.45-1 1-1h.5c.28 0 .5-.22.5-.5v-1c0-.28-.22-.5-.5-.5h-1c-.28 0-.5.22-.5.5V7H4c0-1.5 1.5-3 3-3s3 1 3 2.5zM7 2.3c3.14 0 5.7 2.56 5.7 5.7s-2.56 5.7-5.7 5.7A5.71 5.71 0 011.3 8c0-3.14 2.56-5.7 5.7-5.7zM7 1C3.14 1 0 4.14 0 8s3.14 7 7 7 7-3.14 7-7-3.14-7-7-7z"/></svg>
                </a>
              </h4>


              <p class="mb-2 get-repo-decription-text">
                  Use a password protected SSH key.
              </p>

              <div class="input-group">
  <input type="text" class="form-control input-monospace input-sm" data-autoselect value="git@github.com:openode-io/openode-cli.git" aria-label="Clone this repository at git@github.com:openode-io/openode-cli.git" readonly>
  <div class="input-group-button">
    <clipboard-copy value="git@github.com:openode-io/openode-cli.git" aria-label="Copy to clipboard" class="btn btn-sm" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;clone_or_download.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;feature_clicked&quot;:&quot;COPY_URL&quot;,&quot;git_repository_type&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY&quot;,&quot;repository_id&quot;:92784148,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:8007722}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="225dac5bb9a585254cb08d70d0c5b63f56c307233d941462436c1c088271d773"><svg class="octicon octicon-clippy" viewBox="0 0 14 16" version="1.1" width="14" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M2 13h4v1H2v-1zm5-6H2v1h5V7zm2 3V8l-3 3 3 3v-2h5v-2H9zM4.5 9H2v1h2.5V9zM2 12h2.5v-1H2v1zm9 1h1v2c-.02.28-.11.52-.3.7-.19.18-.42.28-.7.3H1c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1V4c0-.55.45-1 1-1h3c0-1.11.89-2 2-2 1.11 0 2 .89 2 2h3c.55 0 1 .45 1 1v5h-1V6H1v9h10v-2zM2 5h8c0-.55-.45-1-1-1H8c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s-.45-1-1-1-1 .45-1 1-.45 1-1 1H3c-.55 0-1 .45-1 1z"/></svg></clipboard-copy>
  </div>
</div>

          </div>
        <div class="mt-2 d-flex">
          <a class="btn btn-outline get-repo-btn tooltipped tooltipped-s tooltipped-multiline js-remove-unless-platform js-get-repo" aria-label="Clone openode-io/openode-cli to your computer and use it in GitHub Desktop." data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;clone_or_download.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;feature_clicked&quot;:&quot;OPEN_IN_DESKTOP&quot;,&quot;git_repository_type&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY&quot;,&quot;repository_id&quot;:92784148,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:8007722}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="27ea0c1701ed75a53f4e3a159c90ed7e6aefeefce957f1ca7d6d6f1854d16bf0" data-platforms="windows,mac" href="https://desktop.github.com">Open in Desktop</a>

<a class="flex-1 btn btn-outline get-repo-btn " rel="nofollow" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;clone_or_download.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;feature_clicked&quot;:&quot;DOWNLOAD_ZIP&quot;,&quot;git_repository_type&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY&quot;,&quot;repository_id&quot;:92784148,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:8007722}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="ad402b5d1aec70ae27b7451e79893889c6b4b016c2668bba19c580b55aab3c08" data-ga-click="Repository, download zip, location:repo overview" href="/openode-io/openode-cli/archive/master.zip">Download ZIP</a>

        </div>
      </div>


      <div class="js-modal-download-mac py-2 px-3 d-none">
        <h4 class="lh-condensed mb-3">Launching GitHub Desktop<span class="AnimatedEllipsis"></span></h4>
        <p class="text-gray">If nothing happens, <a href="https://desktop.github.com/">download GitHub Desktop</a> and try again.</p>
        <p><button class="btn-link js-get-repo-modal-download-back">Go back</button></p>

</details>

    </span>

              <path class="file-zip" d="M17,14 L1,14 C0.4,14 0,14.5 0,15 L0,41 C0,41.5 0.4,42 1,42 L23,42 C23.6,42 24,41.5 24,41 L24,21 L17,14 Z M22,40 L2,40 L2,16 L8,16 L8,18 L10,18 L10,16 L16,16 L22,22 L22,40 Z M8,30.5 C6.8,31.2 6,32.5 6,34 L6,36 L14,36 L14,34 C14,31.8 12.2,30 10,30 L10,28 L8,28 L8,30.5 Z M12,32 L12,34 L8,34 L8,32 L12,32 Z M10,20 L10,18 L12,18 L12,20 L10,20 Z M8,20 L10,20 L10,22 L8,22 L8,20 Z M10,24 L10,22 L12,22 L12,24 L10,24 Z M8,24 L10,24 L10,26 L8,26 L8,24 Z M10,28 L10,26 L12,26 L12,28 L10,28 Z"></path>
              <path class="file-generic" d="M168.5,48 L135.5,48 C134.7,48 134,47.3 134,46.5 L134,7.5 C134,6.7 134.7,6 135.5,6 L159,6 L170,17 L170,46.5 C170,47.3 169.3,48 168.5,48 Z M168,18 L158,8 L136,8 L136,46 L168,46 L168,18 Z M140,35 L140,33 L161,33 L161,35 L140,35 Z M140,30 L140,28 L161,28 L161,30 L140,30 Z M140,25 L140,23 L161,23 L161,25 L140,25 Z M140,17 L140,15 L152,15 L152,17 L140,17 Z M140,40 L140,38 L161,38 L161,40 L140,40 Z"></path>
              <path class="file-acrobat" d="M181,14 C180.5,14 180,14.5 180,15 L180,41 C180,41.5 180.5,42 181,42 L203,42 C203.5,42 204,41.5 204,41 L204,23 L204,21 L197,14 L181,14 Z M200.8,29.9 C200.3,29.8 199.8,29.7 199.3,29.7 C198.5,29.7 197.7,29.8 196.8,29.9 C196.3,29.8 195.7,29.3 194.8,28.6 C193.9,27.9 193.1,26.3 192.2,23.9 C192.5,22.2 192.6,20.9 192.7,19.9 C192.8,18.9 192.8,18.4 192.7,18.4 C192.8,17.6 192.6,17 192.3,16.6 C192,16.2 191.4,16 191,16 L196,16 L202,22 L202,30.4 C201.6,30.2 201.2,30 200.8,29.9 Z M182,16 L190,16 C189.8,16.1 189.6,16.2 189.4,16.4 C189.2,16.6 189,16.9 188.9,17.4 C188.7,18.2 188.6,19.2 188.7,20.3 C188.8,21.5 189.1,22.7 189.4,23.9 C188.9,25.4 188.2,27.2 187.2,29.3 C186.2,31.4 185.6,32.6 185.4,33 C185.1,33.1 184.7,33.3 184,33.6 C183.3,33.9 182.7,34.4 182,35 L182,16 L182,16 Z M195.1,31 C193.8,31.2 192.6,31.4 191.5,31.7 C190.3,32 189.1,32.4 187.8,32.9 L189,30.4 C189.8,28.7 190.4,27.2 190.8,25.8 L190.8,25.9 C191.7,28.2 192.5,29.6 193.1,30.1 C193.8,30.5 194.5,30.8 195.1,31 L195.1,31 Z M184.1,39.2 C185,38.4 186.2,36.9 187.7,34.4 C188.3,34.1 188.9,33.9 189.3,33.7 L190.1,33.4 C191.1,33.1 192,32.9 193,32.7 C194,32.5 195,32.4 196,32.3 C196.9,32.7 197.9,33.1 198.8,33.3 C199.8,33.6 200.6,33.7 201.3,33.8 C201.5,33.8 201.8,34 202,34 L202,40 L182,40 C182.4,39.9 183.6,39.6 184.1,39.2 Z"></path>
              <path class="file-code" d="M111,0 L82,0 C80.9,0 80,0.9 80,2 L80,50 C80,51.1 80.9,52 82,52 L122,52 C123.1,52 124,51.1 124,50 L124,13 L111,0 Z M122,50 L82,50 L82,2 L110,2 L122,14 L122,50 Z M107,18 L116,28 L107,38 L104,35 L111,28 L104,21 L107,18 Z M100,21 L93,28 L100,35 L97,38 L88,28 L97,18 L100,21 Z"></path>
            </g>
          </svg>

          <h2>Drop to upload your files</h2>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>


</div>

  <div id="readme" class="Box md js-code-block-container Box--condensed">
    <div class="Box-header d-flex flex-items-center flex-justify-between ">
      <h2 class="Box-title pr-3">
        <svg class="octicon octicon-book" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M3 5h4v1H3V5zm0 3h4V7H3v1zm0 2h4V9H3v1zm11-5h-4v1h4V5zm0 2h-4v1h4V7zm0 2h-4v1h4V9zm2-6v9c0 .55-.45 1-1 1H9.5l-1 1-1-1H2c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1V3c0-.55.45-1 1-1h5.5l1 1 1-1H15c.55 0 1 .45 1 1zm-8 .5L7.5 3H2v9h6V3.5zm7-.5H9.5l-.5.5V12h6V3z"/></svg>
        README.md
      </h2>
        <div>
            <a href="/openode-io/openode-cli/edit/master/README.md" class="Box-btn-octicon btn-octicon float-right" aria-label="Edit this file"><svg class="octicon octicon-pencil" viewBox="0 0 14 16" version="1.1" width="14" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M0 12v3h3l8-8-3-3-8 8zm3 2H1v-2h1v1h1v1zm10.3-9.3L12 6 9 3l1.3-1.3a.996.996 0 011.41 0l1.59 1.59c.39.39.39 1.02 0 1.41z"/></svg></a>
        </div>
    </div>
        <div class="Popover anim-scale-in js-tagsearch-popover"
     hidden
     data-tagsearch-url="/openode-io/openode-cli/find-symbols"
     data-tagsearch-ref="master"
     data-tagsearch-path="README.md"
     data-tagsearch-lang="Markdown"
     data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;code_navigation.click_on_symbol&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;action&quot;:&quot;click_on_symbol&quot;,&quot;repository_id&quot;:92784148,&quot;ref&quot;:&quot;master&quot;,&quot;language&quot;:&quot;Markdown&quot;,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/openode-io/openode-cli&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:8007722}}"
     data-hydro-click-hmac="d65ab6c9a58edf06ccc8c08a82383e9784c51f489e8484d864016ee8d682ee92">
  <div class="Popover-message Popover-message--large Popover-message--top-left TagsearchPopover mt-1 mb-4 mx-auto Box box-shadow-large">
    <div class="TagsearchPopover-content js-tagsearch-popover-content overflow-auto" style="will-change:transform;">
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      <div class="Box-body">
        <article class="markdown-body entry-content p-5" itemprop="text"><h1><a id="user-content-openode-cli" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#openode-cli"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>openode-cli</h1>
<p><a href="https://nodei.co/npm/openode/" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e1389ca45bdc319f68607d35c36de950cd0503e4/68747470733a2f2f6e6f6465692e636f2f6e706d2f6f70656e6f64652e706e67" alt="NPM" data-canonical-src="https://nodei.co/npm/openode.png" style="max-width:100%;"></a></p>
<p><a href="https://travis-ci.org/openode-io/openode-cli" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/669a61d8ca63675f9b54a3d3e3ab371bfbc4eb04/68747470733a2f2f7472617669732d63692e6f72672f6f70656e6f64652d696f2f6f70656e6f64652d636c692e7376673f6272616e63683d6d6173746572" alt="Build status" data-canonical-src="https://travis-ci.org/openode-io/openode-cli.svg?branch=master" style="max-width:100%;"></a></p>
<p></p>
<h2><a id="user-content-installation" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#installation"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Installation</h2>
<pre><code>npm install -g openode
</code></pre>
<h2><a id="user-content-usage" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#usage"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Usage</h2>
<h3><a id="user-content-deploy-an-instance" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#deploy-an-instance"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Deploy an Instance</h3>
<p>First, just go to your project directory in command line:</p>
<pre><code>cd [your project directory]
</code></pre>
<p>And then just type:</p>
<pre><code>openode deploy
</code></pre>
<p>This command will upload your local repository to the opeNode cloud, npm install,
then launch a secure container of your server, and then put it online. During this
command, you can also select between using a subdomain.openode.io or a custom domain.</p>
<p>Note that when you run <em>openode deploy</em> and your website is already running, it will update your files, update the environment variables (if they changed), and reload your website with 0-second-downtime.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-options" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#options"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Options</h4>
<pre><code>openode deploy [-t TOKEN -s SITE_NAME]
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><em>-t:</em> Provide an API token used for authentication.</li>
<li><em>-s:</em> Provide a site name.</li>
</ul>
<p><em>.openodeignore</em>: If you add a .openodeignore file in your repository, the
list of files provided in this file will get ignored (not sent). The format is the
same as the well known .gitignore.</p>
<h3><a id="user-content-login" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#login"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Login</h3>
<p>If you want to switch to a different user, just use:</p>
<pre><code>openode login
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-restart" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#restart"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Restart</h3>
<p>If you would like to deploy without synchronizing the files, this is the right command to use:</p>
<pre><code>openode restart
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-sync---send-only-the-changednew-files" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#sync---send-only-the-changednew-files"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Sync - Send only the changed/new files</h3>
<p>If you only need to send new files without deploying, then you can simply run:</p>
<pre><code>openode sync
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-sync-and-reload" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#sync-and-reload"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Sync and Reload</h3>
<p>A shortcut to synchronize and reload can be used:</p>
<pre><code>openode sync-n-reload
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-upgrading-your-plan" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#upgrading-your-plan"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Upgrading Your Plan</h3>
<p>In order to upgrade your plan, you first have to look at the possible plans using:</p>
<pre><code>openode plans
</code></pre>
<p>Pick the right <em>id</em>, and then you can upgrade by running:</p>
<pre><code>openode set-plan PLAN_ID
</code></pre>
<p>You can always verify which plan is currently active with:</p>
<pre><code>openode plan
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-change-instance" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#change-instance"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>change-instance</h3>
<p>To change the currently active instance, type:</p>
<pre><code>openode change-instance [SITENAME]
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-ci-conf" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#ci-conf"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>ci-conf</h3>
<p>To integrate with your favorite continuous integration (CI) tool, you can use the
following command in order to generate the .openode file:</p>
<pre><code>openode ci-conf TOKEN SITENAME
</code></pre>
<p>Note that you can avoid using <em>ci-conf</em> and provide the token and sitename by using the <em>-t</em> and <em>-s</em> options in the deploy command, for example: <em>openode deploy -t your_token -s your_sitename</em>.</p>
<h3><a id="user-content-status" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#status"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Status</h3>
<p>You can obtain the info on your website instance via:</p>
<pre><code>openode status
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-logs" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#logs"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Logs</h3>
<p>You can view the logs by using the following command:</p>
<pre><code>openode logs [-n nbLines]
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><em>-n:</em> (Optional) Returns the N last lines for all log types.</li>
</ul>
<h3><a id="user-content-stats" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#stats"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Stats</h3>
<p>You can obtain stats (CPU, RAM, disk, etc.) about your instance:</p>
<pre><code>openode stats
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-stopping-an-instance" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#stopping-an-instance"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Stopping an Instance</h3>
<pre><code>openode stop
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-run-a-remote-command" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#run-a-remote-command"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Run a Remote Command</h3>
<p>The following command allows to run a command in your running container:</p>
<pre><code>openode exec [yourCmd]
</code></pre>
<p>For example, if you run openode <code>cmd "ls -la"</code>, the list of files will be listed.</p>
<h3><a id="user-content-clear-remote-repository" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#clear-remote-repository"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Clear remote repository</h3>
<p>In order to clear all content of your cloud repository (excluding persistent volumes),
the following operation must done:</p>
<pre><code>openode erase-all
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-custom-domain" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#custom-domain"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Custom Domain</h3>
<p>To enable a custom domain, make sure to enter your custom domain while running
openode deploy.
Then you can manage your custom domain subdomains using the following commands.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-list-aliases-subdomains" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#list-aliases-subdomains"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>List aliases (subdomains)</h4>
<pre><code>openode list-aliases
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-add-an-alias-subdomain" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#add-an-alias-subdomain"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Add an alias (subdomain)</h4>
<pre><code>openode add-alias [hostname]
</code></pre>
<p>If your custom domain is for example mycustomdomain.com, then you can run</p>
<pre><code>openode add-alias www.mycustomdomain.com
openode add-alias blog.mycustomdomain.com
</code></pre>
<p>in order to point mycustomdomain.com, <a href="http://www.mycustomdomain.com" rel="nofollow">www.mycustomdomain.com</a>, and blog.mycustomdomain.com
to this instance.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-removing-an-alias-subdomain" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#removing-an-alias-subdomain"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Removing an alias (subdomain)</h4>
<pre><code>openode del-alias [hostname]
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-list-dns" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#list-dns"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>list-dns</h4>
<p>To list all DNS settings</p>
<pre><code>openode list-dns
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-add-dns" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#add-dns"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>add-dns</h4>
<p>A new DNS entry can be added with:</p>
<pre><code>openode add-dns [domainName] [type] [value] [priority]
</code></pre>
<p>where the domainName is the domain name, type is the DNS entry type (A, TXT, etc.), and finally a value must be set. A priority can be set for MX type records.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-del-dns" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#del-dns"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>del-dns</h4>
<p>To delete a DNS entry:</p>
<pre><code>openode del-dns [id]
</code></pre>
<p>where id corresponds to the id returned by list-dns.</p>
<h3><a id="user-content-persistence" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#persistence"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Persistence</h3>
<p>By default no data can be persisted in your instance (immutable). In order to persist
data, you need to increase/decrease your storage. It will create an external persisted
disk which will remain available wether or not your instance is online.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-increase-storage" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#increase-storage"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Increase storage</h4>
<p>You can increase your storage via:</p>
<pre><code>openode increase-storage [amountGB]
</code></pre>
<p>where amountGB is the number of GBs to add.</p>
<p>where amountGB is the number of GBs to decrease.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-destroy-storage" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#destroy-storage"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Destroy storage</h4>
<p>If you want to manually destroy your storage disk, you can do so via:</p>
<pre><code>openode destroy-storage
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-defining-storage-areas" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#defining-storage-areas"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Defining storage areas</h3>
<p>The storage areas are folders which will never be deleted. Those folders can
be used for storage purpose (database, configurations, etc.).</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-list-storage-areas" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#list-storage-areas"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>List storage areas</h4>
<pre><code>openode storage-areas
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-add-a-storage-area" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#add-a-storage-area"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Add a storage area</h4>
<pre><code>openode add-storage-area [relative-folder]
</code></pre>
<p>Exemple [relative-folder]: db/</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-delete-a-storage-area" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#delete-a-storage-area"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Delete a storage area</h4>
<pre><code>openode del-storage-area [relative-folder]
</code></pre>
<p>Exemple [relative-folder]: db/</p>
<h3><a id="user-content-locations" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#locations"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Locations</h3>
<p>The following commands allow to manage locations where your website is deployed.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-list-available-locations" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#list-available-locations"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>List available locations</h4>
<pre><code>openode available-locations
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-currently-active-locations" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#currently-active-locations"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Currently active locations</h4>
<pre><code>openode locations
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-add-a-location" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#add-a-location"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Add a location</h4>
<pre><code>openode add-location [location-id]
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-remove-a-location" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#remove-a-location"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Remove a location</h4>
<pre><code>openode del-location [location-id]
</code></pre>
<h3><a id="user-content-templates" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#templates"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Templates</h3>
<p>Templates are Dockerfile which can be copied to your local. The Dockerfile is
what we use to deploy your instances. You are free to use as is a Dockerfile
template or adapt it to your needs.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-list-templates" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#list-templates"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>List templates</h4>
<p>To view the list of all available templates, type:</p>
<pre><code>openode list-templates
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-get-info-about-a-template" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#get-info-about-a-template"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Get info about a template</h4>
<p>To get the template description:</p>
<pre><code>openode template-info [template-name]
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-retrieve-a-template" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#retrieve-a-template"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Retrieve a template</h4>
<p>To get a copy of a template, just do:</p>
<pre><code>openode template [template-name]
</code></pre>
<p>Note that if you do not specify a template name, the CLI will get the most
appropriate template based on your local repository.</p>
<h3><a id="user-content-configs" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#configs"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Configs</h3>
<p>Website configs, such as the build script path, can be managed via the CLI.</p>
<h4><a id="user-content-list-available-config-variables" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#list-available-config-variables"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>List available config variables</h4>
<pre><code>openode available-configs
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-set-a-config" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#set-a-config"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Set a config</h4>
<pre><code>openode set-config [variable] [value]
</code></pre>
<h4><a id="user-content-get-the-value-of-a-given-variable" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#get-the-value-of-a-given-variable"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Get the value of a given variable</h4>
<pre><code>openode config [variable]
</code></pre>
<h2><a id="user-content-license" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#license"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>License</h2>
<p>ISC</p>
</article>
      </div>
  </div>




  </div>
</div>

    </main>
  </div>
  

  </div>

    <svg class="octicon octicon-alert" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M8.893 1.5c-.183-.31-.52-.5-.887-.5s-.703.19-.886.5L.138 13.499a.98.98 0 000 1.001c.193.31.53.501.886.501h13.964c.367 0 .704-.19.877-.5a1.03 1.03 0 00.01-1.002L8.893 1.5zm.133 11.497H6.987v-2.003h2.039v2.003zm0-3.004H6.987V5.987h2.039v4.006z"/></svg>

    </button>
    You can’t perform that action at this time.
  </div>
